name: District of Disappointments
description:
Project created as submission to #GrimdarkDoomJam, it's still in very early state that I'd like to continue developing in my free time. Hopefully, the updates will appear quite regularly.

District of Disappointments is supposed to be an action-adventure game set in the slums of an Eastern Bloc city. As a young boy you're looking for your brother who didn't come back home one cold November evening.

The game is kept in late 90s / early 2000s 3D style with a bit of surreal flavour.
